work.title: Solutions/Technical Consultant, Professional Services
description: Developed custom Sitecore components and functionality catered to client's needs
Advised clients on best practices for code implementation and site architectural
Collaborated with DevOps teams to improve continuous integration and deployment pipelines
Fostered strong client relationships to ensure clear communication and successful project outcomes

work.title: Senior Software Engineer, Product Support Services
description: Coordinated training schedules for all new team members onboarding with the North America team
Instructor and examiner in C#, ASP.NET, and Sitecore technologies for new team members
Led knowledge-sharing sessions to enahnce team expertise
Developed tools for the support team, and contributed code to the product team

work.title: Software Engineer, Product Support Services
description: Supported customers by addressing product issues and delivering solutions within contracted SLAs
Developed patches/diagnostic pages for customers
Reported bugs and feature requests, updated documentation and knowledge base articles
Participated in 24x7x365 on-call support rotation providing customer support globally at any time

work.title: Integrated Systems Engineering Co-op
description: Regression test and troubleshoot MX products with other engineers and technicians
Develop new C# utilities and maintain old software utilities for testing
Update Systems documents and provide general Systems team support
Volunteered to assist in organizing and managing volleyball events in the workplace

work.title: NPI Project Engineering Co-op
description: Supported the Project Engineering group with engineering test part acquisition
Manage documentation, parts, and assemblies in WESCAM's ERP system
Used VBA to create custom excel tools for specific applications

school.title: Bachelor of Engineering, Mechatronics and Management
description: Mechatronics combines concepts of Mechanical, Electrical, Software Engineering
Management designation included Finance, Marketing, Business Operations, and more
Completed 16-month Co-op in addition to a five-year academic schedule

projects.title: PokeGuesser
projects.shortDescription: A fun React app project that is intended to be a guessing game for my nephews.  This is still a work in progress.
description: A fun exercise in creating a game for my nephews
Makes use of the of the free PokeAPI: https://pokeapi.co/

projects.title: jasst.github.io/jasstsg
projects.shortDescription: The site you are on right now!  It serves as both my resume and portfolio.  Thank you for taking an interest in me.
description: Personal website, designed and developed using React.js and TypeScript
Hosted and deployed the website on GitHub Pages for seamless updates
Showcases hobby projects and technical skills with a clean, simple design

projects.title: TheTallTankard
projects.shortDescription: Originally intended to replace my ASP.NET Core app of a similar name.  This instead hosts a couple of tools and a search bar that one day I'll get around to implementing.
description: A react app that I had hoped would replace my older ASP.NET Core project with a similar name
Features a couple of pages with tools for D&D 5th edition

projects.title: Mortgage Calculator
projects.shortDescription: A short-term project a friend and I worked on.  The idea was to build a financial app that hosted different kinds of calculators with clear and simple tables, visualisations, and UI.
description: A simple single page application for calculating mortgage payments
Made using HTML, Javascript, Bootstrap, and Chart.js
Displays payment information over the entire amortization period

projects.title: TheTallTankardTavern
projects.shortDescription: An ASP.NET Core MVC app that I use to run my D&D sessions.  My players can view and update their characters from the comfort of their home, while I manage everything I need all in one place.
description: An ASP.NET Core 3.1 MVC app to manage a variety of data for my D&D 5th Edition campaign
Hosted in IIS with remote access for players to track their character data from home

projects.title: SmartWalker
projects.shortDescription: McMaster Mechatronics Engineering capstone project.  Intended to provide better support for those use walkers to aid them when getting around.
description: Assistive walker with autonomous navigation and manual driving aid.  My contributions are listed below
Computed position using reference frame transformation and triangulation
Used OpenCV in Python for detecting ArUco markers used for positioning and navigation
PID Control of wheel motors using Arduino boards
Assisted with socket programming for Bluetooth and Ethernet connections
